Ganbatte ne!

On the shoulders of the tinternet

Jan 26, 2019

If there is something you want to do, your chances of finding a usable tool/set of instructions/solution online, for free, are enormous. Except for the issue of shoulder pain from spending too much time in front of the computer.

It so turned out that no actual electro-swing was listened to while this page was being made.
